name: Zesty Quinoa & Tomato Salad
description: Quinoa is packed with energy-boosting protein. Make a big batch of quinoa and add to any salad or side dish.
preparation: Combine quinoa and water in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 15 minutes, or until water is absorbed. Remove and let stand for 5 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Serve immediately or chill for 30 minutes and serve as a cold salad.
tips: Flavour Changer: Try your favourite prepared Epicure Dressing instead of Poco Picante Salsa. Top with any of Epicure’s Toppers.
